about_the_game:
This is a framework for a Wuxia World Simulator, we want to create a community of Wuxia worlds where everyone is free to create and share content. The official scenario is also a comprehensive demonstration of the MOD development capabilities - players can write their own Jianghu stories in ‘Turn of Destiny’ and ‘Sandbox Mode’.

Jianghu Launcher

The default script provided by the game is also a comprehensive demonstration of the game's MOD development capabilities.
We hope to work with the Creative Workshop community to iterate and create a unique and highly scalable “Jianghu Launcher” experience.

Rich System Components Designed for Modularization

Taking into account the sense of immersion of actual martial arts players and the ease of use of module developers, we have included components such as open-world map design, world turf battles, exploration replicas, real-time battles, Breath of Fate (role-playing with time advancement), sect meetings, offline online battles, and so on, which are comprehensively demonstrated and applied in the scripts provided by the official authorities.

Dynamic Evolution

.The world can have rule-driven, dynamic evolution capabilities. The behaviors and interactions of each faction and character in the world can be expanded. Players can have a different game experience every time they start.

High Freedom

Solo in the jianghu or open the door to set up a school, cultivate and refine martial arts or lead the disciples to unify the jianghu, you can choose your own way of playing in the jianghu.

Real-time combat system, rich build system

There are more than 100 kinds of martial arts samples, stunts and rich talent and props system in the game, and the battle operation adopts real-time system. Reasonable matching and operation is the key to win!

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 / Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 建议16:9 屏幕分辨率
